I didn't get any image file with this. Just 153 .rar-files and an .url. How do I make this work? 
I can't create an image file that big on my own, since I've only got the unregistered version of PowerISO. Is there another program I need for this to work?

Forget aboout my eariler comment. I've solved it as the noob I am.
But it has brought me yet another problem. I want to play with my authentic blizz account, but when I tried to login, it said "not valid". So, I changed the realmlist.wtf to "set realmlist scarshield legion" wich is the blizz realm where my main char is. But when I try to login after doing this, it says "unable to connect". What am I supposed to do to make blizz's servers playable with this game?

wctr > try set realmlist eu.worldofwarcraft.com.. cant remember it correctly, maybe do a google search for "blizzard realmlist"

:D
I've tried you typ petergdk. But eu.worldofwarcraft.com doesn't work :( I'll have to search some more.
I found it, guys. To be able to log on to Blizzard's realms you have to set realmlist.wtf to "set realmlist eu.logon.worldofwarcraft.com". It wasn't harder than that. Cheers!

If your looking for a good server rooksrealm(dot)servegame(dot)com


We have a great Blizz like server, low lag, no drops, active GM's and a stable, custom database with working battlefields, epic mounts, and much more

You dont need to download torrents to get this game, follow the instructions on this free server site 

http://wow.dethpod.com 

or at 

http://wow.dethpod.com/guide.php 

Download the game faster directy from blizzard and then you know theres no keyloggers/virus crap, patch it to current version using the launcher.exe change the realmlist.wtf file to read "set realmlist wow.dethpod.com" (without quotes) and your done. This server is Free, with a great bunch of people.
